alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Elmore; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 11:31AM CST until February 07 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River At Montgomery affecting Lowndes, Montgomery, Elmore, Dallas and Autauga Counties. .Flooding continues to be forecast on the Alabama River at Montgomery and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River At Montgomery. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Extensive flooding of low lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 33.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 35.3 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
